about_the_game:
Nonu chronicles the story of a small island, hidden from the world, succumbing to a plague of violence. You have been called to save a world dying under the weight of its own corruption and greed.

The god Nonu has all but disappeared from your homeland. Finding and restoring his power is integral to the survival of your entire world.

Resources are scarce, and your enemies have you outnumbered.

You will have to piece together an impossible mystery about the world, and its diverse inhabitants, to truly finish your quest.

Souls-Like With A Twist

  • Successful impacts, and even the environment, award the player and enemies access to Heat. You must methodically approach each battle to gather more Heat than your enemies, and destroy them.

Intelligent Enemy Tactics

  • Enemies communicate with each other to survive. They work together to steal your resources. They have the same tools as you, and nothing to lose. You must understand them well.

Lore-Rich Atmospheric World

  • The world is beautifully hand drawn, and full of secrets to explore. Each secret will bring you closer to learning more about several eclectic groups of inhabitants. Delve into their history and discover the true culprit.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 1060
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Nonu is a fantasy souls-like set in a beautiful hand-drawn world. Face intelligent enemies in true souls-like fashion, with a unique twist. Draw upon the power of Nonu to forge your own fighting style, and uncover untold truths about the world, and its inhabitants.
